long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When using the Gorgias x Chatarmin Integration, this Extension boosts the efficiency for Agents answering to Chatarmin Tickets through Gorgias.

You can type the message in the "normal Text-Editor" from Gorgias, then click "Send message" in the Chatarmin Widget and the text gets pasted in the input directly
